headline.print_headline: Navajo Nation President Approves Junk-Food Tax
headline.main: Navajo Nation President Approves Junk-Food Tax

docs.lead_paragraph: The sales tax on cookies, chips, sodas and other junk food sold on the country's largest American Indian reservation is going up.
docs.snippet: The sales tax on cookies, chips, sodas and other junk food sold on the country's largest American Indian reservation is going up.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Government Proposes More Transparency in Clinical Trials
headline.main: U.S. Government Proposes More Transparency in Clinical Trials

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. health officials on Wednesday proposed significantly expanding what researchers are required to report about clinical trials of drugs, devices, and other interventions, addressing concerns that data crucial to patients and physicians is kept secret.
docs.snippet: U.S. health officials on Wednesday proposed significantly expanding what researchers are required to report about clinical trials of drugs, devices, and other interventions, addressing concerns that data crucial to patients and physicians is kept...

headline.print_headline: Report: Global Obesity Costs Hits $2 Trillion
headline.main: Report: Global Obesity Costs Hits $2 Trillion

docs.lead_paragraph: The global cost of obesity has risen to $2 trillion annually — nearly as much as smoking or the combined impact of armed violence, war and terrorism, according to a new report released Thursday.
docs.snippet: The global cost of obesity has risen to $2 trillion annually — nearly as much as smoking or the combined impact of armed violence, war and terrorism, according to a new report released Thursday.

headline.seo: Latest News: Obama on Immigration, Florida State Lockdown, the Cost of Obesity

docs.lead_paragraph: Here’s what you need to know to start your day.
docs.snippet: Here’s what you need to know to start your day.

headline.print_headline: NY Targets Obesity With Rules on Day-Care Drinks
headline.main: NY Targets Obesity With Rules on Day-Care Drinks

docs.lead_paragraph: New York authorities issued new rules on Wednesday governing licensed day care centers to require they serve low-fat milk, water or 100 percent juice to help prevent obesity.
docs.snippet: New York authorities issued new rules on Wednesday governing licensed day care centers to require they serve low-fat milk, water or 100 percent juice to help prevent obesity.

headline.print_headline: Governments Pledge More to Prevent Malnutrition
headline.main: Governments Pledge More to Prevent Malnutrition

docs.lead_paragraph: More than 170 governments pledged Wednesday to do more to prevent malnutrition around the globe, adopting voluntary guidelines to promote healthy diets and reduce levels of obesity at the start of a three-day U.N. conference.
docs.snippet: More than 170 governments pledged Wednesday to do more to prevent malnutrition around the globe, adopting voluntary guidelines to promote healthy diets and reduce levels of obesity at the start of a three-day U.N. conference.

headline.main: Today in Small Business: 'Unrealistic Value Expectations'

docs.abstract: A “beloved cookbook destination” loses its lease. A start-up that claims better search technology for real estate agents raises $6 million. Is celebrity-branded marijuana coming?
docs.snippet: A “beloved cookbook destination” loses its lease. A start-up that claims better search technology for real estate agents raises $6 million. Is celebrity-branded marijuana coming?

headline.print_headline: London Agency’s Third Pursuit of New York
headline.main: M&C Saatchi Buys a Stake in SS&K

docs.abstract: Advertising column; London-based agency M&C Saatchi announces it is buying a minority stake in successful Manhattan shop SS&K in effort to crack competitive New York market.
docs.lead_paragraph: After two unsuccessful tries to crack the New York market, the London-based agency is buying a minority stake in a successful shop to serve as an outpost.
docs.snippet: After two unsuccessful tries to crack the New York market, the London-based agency is buying a minority stake in a successful shop to serve as an outpost.

headline.main: Got Milk? Might Not Be Doing You Much Good

docs.lead_paragraph: Repeated studies have shown that for adults, milk and the nutrients it contains make little difference to health.
docs.snippet: Repeated studies have shown that for adults, milk and the nutrients it contains make little difference to health.
